details:

CREATE TABLE wp_custom_redirect ( id mediumint(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, custom_url VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
